研究揭示了南非医护人员在大流行期间使用的应对机制加州大学伯克利分校人类学教授 Andrew Wooyoung Kim 的一项新研究揭示了南非约翰内斯堡都会区的医护人员在 COVID-19 大流行期间使用的弹性应对机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Study-reveals-coping-mechanisms-used-by-South-African-healthcare-workers-during-the-pandemic.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230815/Study-reveals-coping-mechanisms-used-by-South-African-healthcare-workers-during-the-pandemic.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84a553ea-c1e6-4060-b03d-e6224ac85170 Tue, 15 Aug 2023 00:14:04 -0400 Study reveals coping mechanisms used by South African healthcare workers during the pandemic
外周肿瘤生物标志物指导 HPV 相关恶性肿瘤的治疗2023 年 8 月 10 日，Oncotarget 第 14 卷发表了一篇新的综述论文，题为“肿瘤负荷的外周替代物指导 HPV 相关恶性肿瘤的化疗和免疫治疗策略”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Peripheral-tumor-biomarkers-to-guide-treatment-for-HPV-linked-malignancies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Peripheral-tumor-biomarkers-to-guide-treatment-for-HPV-linked-malignancies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53949769-6e67-4b65-86d3-ecbba87cd27b Mon, 14 Aug 2023 23:08:34 -0400 Peripheral tumor biomarkers to guide treatment for HPV-associated malignancies
溶瘤病毒可用于“加热”冷肿瘤并改善免疫治疗匹兹堡大学和 UPMC 领导的《实验医学杂志》上的一项新研究表明，为感染癌症或溶瘤病毒配备抑制肿瘤的基因货物可以刺激免疫系统，并有助于免疫疗法缩小或完全清除小鼠的侵袭性肿瘤研究人员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Oncolytic-viruses-could-be-used-to-warm-up-cold-tumors-and-improve-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/Oncolytic-viruses-could-be-used-to-warm-up-cold-tumors-and-improve-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6dcbdc3-51d1-4b9a-856f-ad5c6a638c15 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 22:56:59 -0400 Oncolytic viruses could be used to 'warm up' cold tumors and improve immunotherapy
PSMA PET/CT 无需活检即可诊断老年患者晚期前列腺癌对于疑似前列腺癌的老年患者，PSMA PET/CT 可以诊断晚期疾病并帮助选择治疗方法，而无需进行活检。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/PSMA-PETCT-can-diagnose-advanced-prostate-cancer-in-elderly-病人-without-biopsy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230814/PSMA-PETCT-can-diagnose-advanced-prostate-cancer-in-elderly-病人-without-biopsy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d6288b3d-29bd-4c2f-9a85-fd2d31d20ad5 Mon, 14 Aug 2023 22:44:43 -0400 PSMA PET/CT can diagnose advanced prostate cancer in elderly patients without biopsy
